--- DateTime: 2021/12/24 10:52
--- 判断技能cd
---@class bt_con_enmityCd:ICondition
local bt_con_enmityCd = SimpleClassUtil:class(ICondition)

function bt_con_enmityCd:initData(data)
    self._cdTime = data.cdTime or 10000
end
---@param blackBoard BlackBoard_BattleBase
function bt_con_enmityCd:doCondition(blackBoard,agent)
    local time_enmity = blackBoard._time_enmity
    --- @type PVE_Config_Battle_Manager
    local battleManager = agent._battleManager
    if time_enmity then
        local time = time_enmity +  self._cdTime
        return battleManager._battleTime >= time and Enum_BT.Node_ResultType.Success or Enum_BT.Node_ResultType.Fail
    else
        return Enum_BT.Node_ResultType.Success
    end
end


return bt_con_enmityCd
